recipe. See also 'Assembler' recipe.</p><p>No wastage occurs when producing for 2x gears.<br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="40" width="400" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.p: Recipe applies to all types of gear
This is the 'Crafting Table' recipe. See also 'Assembler' recipe.
No wastage occurs when producing for 2x gears.
